name: Solidly
intro: DEX combining the best of Curve, Uniswap and ve(3,3)
introduce: Solidly is a self-optimizing DEX combining the best of Curve, Uniswap and ve(3,3). Solidly is not just a platform for users to enjoy low-fee decentralized swaps, it is also a place for protocols looking to increase liquidity of their protocol tokens in a capital efficient manner. Solidly offers 2 types of bribes: bribes to voters and bribes to LPs.
